mapper.insert: insert into tb_member values(#{id}, #{memberName}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{memberEmail}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, default, #{memberGender}, #{memberJob}, null, null, default)
mapper.select: select * from applocation_group where member_id = #{memberId} and group_accept = 'Y'
